query.sql: SELECT c.card_id from card c inner join attribute_value vLink on (vLink.card_id = c.card_id) inner join card cLink on (cLink.card_id = vLink.number_value) inner join attribute_value vUser on (vUser.card_id = cLink.card_id) inner join attribute_value vUrg on (vUrg.card_id = cLink.card_id) left outer join attribute_value inDate on inDate.card_id = cLink.card_id and inDate.attribute_code = 'JBR_INCOMEDATE' where c.status_id = 107 and vLink.attribute_code = 'JBR_VISA_VISA' and cLink.status_id = 107 and vUser.attribute_code = 'JBR_VISA_RESPONSIBLE' and vUser.number_value = %CURRENTUSER% and vUrg.attribute_code = 'JBR_HOWFAST' and vUrg.value_id = 1912 order by inDate.date_value desc
